messages.content: Use the tavily_search tool multiple times to collect clues before answering. Do not fabricate facts; call the tool whenever you need external information.
Where was the character $character originally from?
Solve this only by performing several tavily_search queries and tracing biography links. Do not fabricate facts; call the tool whenever you need external information.
Find the birthplace of the historian $character.
You must search multiple times to follow family lineage and origin clues. Do not fabricate facts; call the tool whenever you need external information.
Which country does the adventurer $character come from?
Follow mentor chains using repeated tavily_search requests to determine homeland. Do not fabricate facts; call the tool whenever you need external information.
Determine the homeland of the magician $character.
Search for the character, then their order, then their city; combine results. Do not fabricate facts; call the tool whenever you need external information.
